addNetwork

Indexes a network and adds the index to the global index.

Parameters:

removeNetworkIndex

void removeNetworkIndex(org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork network)
Removes the specified network from the global index. To free up memory, this method should be called whenever a network is destroyed.

Parameters:
network - CyNetwork object
